title: CLDF dataset derived from Gerardi and Reichert's "The Tupí-Guaraní Language Family: A Phylogenetic Classification" from 2020
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Ferraz Gerardi, Fabrício and Reichert, Stanislav (2020) The Tupí-Guaraní Language Family: A Phylogenetic Classification. To appear in Diachronica.
